sentinel.led
Class NotificationMessage

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--sentinel.led.NotificationMessage
public class NotificationMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, SentinelMessage

The notification message is implemented the sentinel message, containing an event of interest name, an application name in which an event has raised, a location where the application runs, and the PCTable of which the event is detected. This detection request message is packed by a produder and is sent to the server GED who will propagate the request to the consumer.

See Also:
